channel.title: Java virtual machine
channel.description:
So i am trying to compile my 508/525 server and when i try to it comes up with this error:
[code]Compiling net/com/codeusa/Engine.java Unrecognized option: -d Could not create the java virtual machine. Press any key to continue...[/code]
This is the code in my compiler: [code]@echo off title compile cd ../src echo Compiling net/com/codeusa/Engine.java "C:\WINDOWS\system32\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/codeusa/Engine.java pause[/code]
-The Java path is correct.
So can anyone help?

item.title: Java virtual machine
item.dc:creator: @darkfowlman darkfowlman
item.description:
@darkfowlman wrote:

So i am trying to compile my 508/525 server and when i try to it comes up with this error:

Compiling net/com/codeusa/Engine.java Unrecognized option: -d Could not create the java virtual machine. Press any key to continue...

This is the code in my compiler: @echo off title compile cd ../src echo Compiling net/com/codeusa/Engine.java "C:\WINDOWS\system32\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/codeusa/Engine.java pause

-The Java path is correct.

So can anyone help?
